    About

    Hey there,

    Welcome to randomwalk blog. Here you will get random thoughts/ studies/ opinions/ etc. related to cybersecurity and machine learning (Or sometimes Computer Science in general). For one to one conversation with author, please use my public key here.

    Contact

    Best way to contact me is email.
